    Probando blog

    \(f(x) = \int_{-\infty}^\infty \hat f(\xi)\,e^{2 \pi i \xi x} \,d\xi\)
    \(mean = \frac{\displaystyle\sum_{i=1}^{n} x_{i}}{n}\)
